mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HOMEGOODS_INFO ( HOMEGOODS_SEQ_NO, TITLE, HOMEGOODS_CONTENTS, REG_DT, CHG_DT, USER_ID )VALUES ( HOMEGOODS_INFO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{homegoodsContents}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{userId} )

INSERT INTO FILE_INFO ( FILE_SEQ, BRD_SEQ_NO, USER_NO, ORI_NAME, CHG_NAME, FILE_SIZE, FILE_PATH, EXTENSION, REG_DT, BRD_KIND ) VALUES ( FILE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{brdSeqNo}, #{userNo}, #{oriName}, #{chgName}, #{fileSize}, #{filePath}, #{extension}, SYSDATE, #{brdKind} )
mapper.select: SELECT A.HN, A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM HN, HI.HOMEGOODS_SEQ_NO as homegoodsSeqNo, HI.TITLE as title, HI.HOMEGOODS_CONTENTS as homegoodsContents, HI.REG_DT as regDt, HI.CHG_DT as chgDt, HI.USER_ID as userId, UI.USER_NAME as userName FROM ( SELECT HI2.* FROM HOMEGOODS_INFO HI2 ORDER BY HOMEGOODS_SEQ_NO DESC ) HI INNER JOIN USER_INFO UI ON HI.USER_ID = UI.USER_ID WHERE HI.TITLE LIKE '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%' OR HI.HOMEGOODS_SEQ_NO LIKE '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%' OR UI.USER_NAME LIKE '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%' OR HI.CHG_DT LIKE '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%' ) A WHERE A.HN BETWEEN (( #{page_num}-1) * #{page_count} + 1 ) AND ( #{page_num} * #{page_count} ) ORDER BY A.HN

SELECT HI.HOMEGOODS_SEQ_NO as homegoodsSeqNo, HI.TITLE as title, HI.HOMEGOODS_CONTENTS as homegoodsContents, HI.REG_DT as regDt, HI.CHG_DT as chgDt, HI.USER_ID as userId, UI.USER_NAME as userName, FI.CHG_NAME as chgName, FI.FILE_SEQ as fileSeq FROM HOMEGOODS_INFO HI LEFT JOIN ( SELECT BRD_KIND, CHG_NAME, FILE_SEQ, BRD_SEQ_NO FROM FILE_INFO WHERE BRD_KIND = 'homegoods' )FI ON HI.HOMEGOODS_SEQ_NO = FI.BRD_SEQ_NO INNER JOIN USER_INFO UI ON HI.USER_ID = UI.USER_ID WHERE HI.HOMEGOODS_SEQ_NO = #{homegoodsSeqNo}

SELECT COUNT(0) AS CNT FROM HOMEGOODS_INFO HI INNER JOIN USER_INFO UI ON HI.USER_ID = UI.USER_ID WHERE HI.TITLE LIKE '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%' OR HI.HOMEGOODS_SEQ_NO LIKE '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%' OR UI.USER_NAME LIKE '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%' OR HI.CHG_DT LIKE '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%'
mapper.update: UPDATE FILE_INFO SET CHG_NAME = #{chgName}, ORI_NAME = #{oriName}, FILE_SIZE = #{fileSize}, FILE_PATH = #{filePath}, EXTENSION = #{extension} WHERE FILE_SEQ = #{fileSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT HI.HOMEGOODS_SEQ_NO as homegoodsSeqNo, HI.TITLE as title, HI.HOMEGOODS_CONTENTS as homegoodsContents, HI.REG_DT as regDt, HI.CHG_DT as chgDt, HI.USER_ID as userId, UI.USER_NAME as userName FROM HOMEGOODS_INFO HI INNER JOIN USER_INFO UI ON HI.USER_ID = UI.USER_ID WHERE HI.USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT HI.HOMEGOODS_SEQ_NO as homegoodsSeqNo, HI.TITLE as title, HI.HOMEGOODS_CONTENTS as homegoodsContents, HI.REG_DT as regDt, HI.CHG_DT as chgDt, HI.USER_ID as userId, UI.USER_NAME as userName FROM HOMEGOODS_INFO HI, USER_INFO UI WHERE HI.USER_ID = UI.USER_ID AND HI.TITLE LIKE '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%' OR HI.HOMEGOODS_SEQ_NO LIKE '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%' OR UI.USER_NAME LIKE '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%' OR HI.CHG_DT LIKE '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%'
